titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 808) to provide certain safeguards with respect to the domestic steel industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Kucinich. Petition No: 107-5.

bill.summary: 12/5/2001--Introduced. Sets forth the rule (modified closed) for the consideration of H.R. 808 (domestic steel industry safeguards).
